[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/package-extractor](./package-extractor.md) &gt; [IExtractorOptions](./package-extractor.iextractoroptions.md) &gt; [subspaces](./package-extractor.iextractoroptions.subspaces.md)

## IExtractorOptions.subspaces property

When using Rush subspaces, this setting can be used to provide configuration information for each individual subspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
subspaces?: IExtractorSubspace[];
```

## Remarks

To avoid confusion, if this setting is used, then the [IExtractorOptions.transformPackageJson](./package-extractor.iextractoroptions.transformpackagejson.md) and [IExtractorOptions.pnpmInstallFolder](./package-extractor.iextractoroptions.pnpminstallfolder.md) settings must not be used.
